ARABIC: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسْلَهُۥ مِن سُلَٰلَةٍ مِّن مَّآءٍ مَّهِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: then produced his seed from an extract of base fluid;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then made his offspring from the extract of base fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then made his progeny from the extract of a mean fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He made His offspring come into existence from an extract of insignificant fluid,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then kept his posterity with a part of an abject fluid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then He made his offspring from semen of despised water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then He made his progeny of an extract, of water held in light estimation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then He fashioned his progeny of an extraction of mean water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then He made his seed from a draught of despised fluid;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then He made his progeny from an extract of a humble fluid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then He made his progeny from an extract of water base.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then He made his progeny from an extract of a base fluid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And made his progeny from a quintessence of the nature of a fluid despised:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then He made his offspring from semen of worthless water (male and female sexual discharge).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then He made his offspring from a clot of weak water (semen).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then made his reproduction from an extract of an insignificant fluid.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then He made his posterity out of the extract of a liquid disdained.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [32:8] then He made his progeny, his offspring, from an extract, a blood clot, of a base, delicate, fluid, namely, the sperm-drop;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then He made his seed) his offspring (from a drought of despised fluid) from a weak drop of the water of man and woman;
